author: lzybkr
body:
F&O supports grouping with a header, but no footer.

A footer is needed to display summary information not known when writing the header, for example the size/count of the files, similar to:

```
 Volume in drive C has no label.
 Volume Serial Number is A61F-3821

 Directory of c:\windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0

09/13/2016  09:46 AM           446,976 powershell.exe
09/13/2016  09:46 AM           212,992 powershell_ise.exe
               2 File(s)        659,968 bytes
               0 Dir(s)  23,720,255,488 bytes free
```
title: Format and output should support footers
